result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lane R Weidner

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on December 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.

JSS Re: recommend removal of JSS on the bond
DA Gruenke does not object
EML: ok

State by Sanford /  Def w/ Atty Krueger
Krueger:  Req House Arrest w/ GPS Monitoring be removed as requirement....Def has been in compliance...has health issues that will be on-going...
Sanford:  State has complied w/ victim/witness notification.  State feels GPS/House Arrest monitoring is approp & necessary...req condition remain
Krueger gives rebuttal argument
CRT:  I don't find the GPS/House Arrest is necessary.  The No Contacts in place are to remain in place.  Def will still be required to reside w/ mother.  Def is only to be at courthouse for official business.  Hve weekly contact w/ JSS
Bail/bond hearing on June 30, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on October 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:04 am   Defendant Lane R Weidner in custody and in court with attorney Rachel Ann Krueger.  Attorney Courtney Strittmater in court for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin.
Prelim waiver filed - signed/understands. No promises/threats.
COURT finds he F, V & I waives his right to a PH.  Probable cause found -  Bound over for trial.
Information filed - Reading waived.  Def Pleads NG - NG Pleas entered
PTC: 7/15 at 3:30 pm    STC: 10/20 at 10:00 am   EML
Krueger argues for a sig bond.  NO new charges coming.  Strittmater believes the cash bond should remain given the threats..... 
COURT comments.  $1,000 sig. bond.  Reside at his mother's house as part of the release plan.  JSS bail monitoring on GPS house arrest except for Dr. appointments.  No contact with R.W or his family.  No contact with the courthouse except for official court business, ie atty meetings and court appearances.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on June 17, 2022 at 11:00 am.

for RAG
Def in custody w/Atty Krueger
$10,000 cash bond req w/cond: no contact w/RW or his family, no contact w/anyone in the courthouse, refer to JSS release plan, comply w/JSS
PH: 6/17 @ 11 (EML)

Hold w/o bond until brought before court signed TWB
DISPATCH 6/9/22
